availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Albert Julius Jenkins (Marion Co store clerk)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, clerk. Baltimore, Maryland native. Married to Ellen Catherine Ingram Jenkins. Father of Amelia Jenkins, Anna Jenkins, and Felix Jenkins.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 76. Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1955), Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky, Roll #7017476: All Counties, p. 1323. Find A Grave, "Albert J. Jenkins (1833-1890)," Memorial # 103728737 http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=103728737&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016).
